tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE models (
    model_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    model_description TEXT,
    model_category VARCHAR(50),
    model_file_path VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE three_d_models (
    model_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    model_description TEXT,
    model_file_path TEXT,
    upload_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE animations (
    animation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    animation_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    animation_description TEXT,
    animation_file_path TEXT,
    upload_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE visual_data (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    data_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    data_description TEXT,
    data_file_path TEXT,
    data_type VARCHAR(50),
    upload_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE 3d_models (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  file_path VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  author VARCHAR(255),
  file_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE animations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  animation_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  duration INT,
  file_path VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  author VARCHAR(255),
  fps INT
);

CREATE TABLE visual_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  data_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  data_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  file_path VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  author VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ar_classroom_simulations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  simulation_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  background_image_path VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  simulation_file_path VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  author VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Animations (
    animation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    animation_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    animation_description TEXT,
    duration_in_seconds INT,
    file_path VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE VisualData (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    data_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    data_description TEXT,
    data_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    file_path VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ARClassrooms (
    classroom_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    classroom_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    classroom_description TEXT,
    location_latitude DECIMAL(10, 6) NOT NULL,
    location_longitude DECIMAL(10, 6) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ClassroomModels (
    classroom_model_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    classroom_id INT NOT NULL,
    model_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (classroom_id) REFERENCES ARClassrooms(classroom_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES Models(model_id)
);
